# Kicking & Screaming (TV series)

Kicking & Screaming is an American reality competition television series created by Matt Kunitz, David Shumsky and Mark Harris and hosted by Hannah Simone. The series premiered on March 9, 2017 on Fox. Kicking & Screaming did not return for 2017â€“2018 TV season, leaving it cancelled after one season.
The show was shot in Fiji. The winning team at the end of the season split a $500,000 prize.
Contestants
The cast is composed by 10 teams of two, one member of the team being a professional survivalist and one being an everyday person.
